page.title: 17SUPERSTITIONS & TRADITIONS
page.content:
Superstitions of Fishermen - Bad luck to meet a woman going to work first thing in the morning. Hide on seeing a priest on way home. Never turn bucket upside down in boat or luck will run out. Never launch boat or set crab pots on Friday's. Never mention pigs,refer to them as 'articles'. Always sneeze over left side of boat. Always put left sock on first. Never say 13, always 12+1.
Traditions- When taking baby to be christened,give parcel'cheese & bread' to first person one met. Break a plate over bride's head. Fire-guns over bride & grooms head. Bride & groom to jump over petting stool.
